name: Test SSH Github Access
author: Wyatt Dahlenburg ( <Wyatt Dahlenburg (@wdahlenb)>
description:
This module will attempt to test remote Git access using
          (.ssh/id_* private keys). This works against GitHub and
          GitLab by default, but can easily be extended to support
          more server types.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: THREADS
options.description: The number of concurrent threads (max one per host)

options.name: ShowProgress
options.description: Display progress messages during a scan

options.name: ShowProgressPercent
options.description: The interval in percent that progress should be shown

options.name: KEY_DIR
options.description: Directory of several keys. Filenames will be recursivley found matching id_* (Ex: /home/user/.ssh)

options.name: GITSERVER
options.description: Parameter to specify alternate Git Server (GitHub, GitLab, etc)
